UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structure-function relationships in bombinins H, antimicrobial peptides from Bombina skin secretions
Literature.Author: Mangoni ML, Grovale N, Giorgi A, Mignogna G, Simmaco M, Barra D

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:3% Hemolysis=4 µM,Human erythrocytes:35% Hemolysis=30 µM
